official_title: Resolution naming Democratic members of the Committee on the Budget, and its chairman.

summary.text: Provides that the following shall constitute the majority party's membership on the Committee on the Budget of the Senate for the remainder of the 93d Congress: Mr. Muskie (chairman), Mr. Magnuson, Mr. Moss, Mr. Mondale, Mr. Hollings, Mr. Cranston, Mr. Chiles, Mr. Abourezk, and Mr. Biden.

titles.title: Resolution naming Democratic members of the Committee on the Budget, and its chairman.
